name: The Send now will deliver the Newsletter to corresponding subscribed immediately

testSteps.description: Given I navigate to the login page

children.description: Is home page: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), http://testmaster.vn/admin

testSteps.description: When I submit username and password

children.description: Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: div.login-form input[type=email]], khanh.tx@live.com

Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: div.login-form input[type=password]], abc123
Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: div.login-form button.btn-login]

testSteps.description: Then I should be logged in
Given I staying create News Page

children.description: Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> xpath: //ul[2]/li[4]/a/span]

testSteps.description: When I provied valid Group and valid subject and valid body and valid name

children.description: Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: button#ddlGroup]
Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> xpath: //div[3]/div/ul/li/a]
Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: input#txtSubject], Thư mời

Input  text: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: div.note-editable.panel-body], Tham dự hội thảo

Click button: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: button.btn.btn-sm.btn-primary.btn-next]

testSteps.description: Then I should see "The News has been sent successfully."

children.description: Waitelement: ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e), [[ChromeDriver: chrome on XP (52ae5a93515bbed0dfbb81e4c7003e0e)] -> css selector: div.body-message]

userStory.storyName: As a Tool manager, I want ability to send created Newsletter, so that I can deliver this Newsletter to subscribed with corresponding group
